name: Extremely Powerful Capybaras: Training Grounds
description:
Become the bullet hell with your friends in this chaotic survival roguelite game for 1 to 4 players. Collect items that unlock weapons and skills, face hordes of enemies and become the mightiest capybaras of all!

Features

  • Choose from a selection of quirky capybara warriors - each with their own starting weapon



  • Fight on your own or with friends in local and online co-op modes!



  • Experiment with different builds by collecting items that unlock weapons and skills





  • Chill in hot water like a true capybara before each run starts
